name: Saint Helena, Ascension, and Tristan da Cunha

tidbits.title: Remote Island Chain
tidbits.description: This British Overseas Territory encompasses three remote and distinct islands: Saint Helena, Ascension, and Tristan da Cunha, each with its own unique history and culture.

tidbits.title: Napoleon's Exile
tidbits.description: Saint Helena is renowned as the place of Napoleon Bonaparte's exile and final years. Longwood House, where he lived, remains a historical landmark.

tidbits.title: Albatross Haven
tidbits.description: Tristan da Cunha, one of the most isolated inhabited islands, hosts a significant population of albatrosses and other seabirds, making it a haven for bird enthusiasts.
